page.title: 08Scouts,Guides and Y.Club.
page.content: The 1st.Old Dalby Scouts meet on a Friday.They do badge work,canoeing and pitching tents.They are going camping in Wales this year.The Cubs meet on a Thursday.They play games and work for badges.The Beavers will be for boys aged 5 to 8 and they will meet on a Thursday.The 1st.Old Dalby Guides meet on Mondays.They make things, go for walks and go camping in the summer to York.The Brownies also play games and make things.They have discos too. The Youth Club is held in the school hall.There is a tuck shop and we play games like British Bulldog.Sometimes they go swimming or on outings.They are having a sponsored bike ride around the R.E.M.E. Camp to raise money for the Youth Club.
